text: Charles Thone (January 4, 1924 - March 7, 2018) was an American politician. He was a member of the Republican Party. He served as the 34th Governor of Nebraska serving from January 4, 1979 through January 6, 1983. He lost re- election to Bob Kerrey. Before being governor, Thone represented Nebraska's 1st congressional district in the United States House of Representatives from January 3, 1971 through January 3, 1979. Thone was born in Hartington, Nebraska. He studied at the University of Nebraska, Lincoln. Thone died on March 7, 2018 in Lincoln, Nebraska of respiratory failure at age 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * Retrieved on 2008-01-24 *National Governors Association *The Political Graveyard Category:1924 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Governors of Nebraska Category:United States representatives from Nebraska Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Nebraska Category:Disease-related deaths in Nebraska
title: Charles Thone
